title: Jake Paul and Tana Mongeau replicate Justin Timberlake and Britney Spears' iconic denim-on-denim
text:
It's one of the most iconic looks of our time.

And Jake Paul, 22, and girlfriend Tana Mongeau, 21, replicated Justin Timberlake and Britney Spears' 2001 American Music Awards denim-on-denim outfits, while out for Halloween on Monday night.

The social media influencers were heading to a private Halloween party in Beverly Hills when they were snapped in their Canadian tuxedos.

Seeing double (denim): Jake Paul, 22, and girlfriend Tana Mongeau, 21, [L] replicated Justin Timberlake and Britney Spears' 2001 American Music Awards denim-on-denim outfits [R], while out for Halloween on Monday night

Bizaardvark actor Paul did a commendable job with his ensemble, obtaining more than passable facsimiles of Justin's jeans and jean jacket.

His denim fedora, however, boasted a flatter brim and his shirt was white as opposed to Justin's steely blue original.

His sunglasses also featured a darker tint than his SexyBack inspiration.

High marks: Bizaardvark actor Paul did a commendable job with his ensemble, obtaining more than passable facsimiles of Justin's jeans and jean jacket

Nice try: His girlfriend since April, meanwhile, missed the mark set by Spears in 2001 by donning a strapless mini dress, as opposed to the Toxic hitmaker's iconic maxi

His girlfriend since April, meanwhile, missed the mark set by Spears in 2001 by donning a strapless mini dress, as opposed to the Toxic hitmaker's iconic maxi.

Nor did she bother with the original trendsetter's denim purse.

The former third partner in Bella Thorne and Mod Sun's 'throuple' did at least try to match Spears' jewelry, by pairing a silver waist chain with sparkling choker and bracelets.

Party time: The social media influencers were heading to a private Halloween party in Beverly Hills when they were snapped in their Canadian tuxedos

Regrets, he's had a few: Justin has previously expressed regret over the much derided 2001 look he wore with his then-girlfriend

Justin has previously expressed regret over the much derided 2001 look he wore with his then-girlfriend.

Speaking with Australian talk show the Project in 2016, the pop star was asked, 'What have you learned about the industry that you didn't know when you were in 'NSync that you know now?'

The 38-year-old pop star replied, 'If you wear denim-on-denim, it will get documented. You know what, I don't think I could even bring that back.'

He then added, 'I'm going to go out on a limb and say if it's worn properly, denim-on-denim could be [brought back].'
description: Jake Paul, 22, and girlfriend Tana Mongeau, 21, replicated Justin Timberlake and Britney Spears' 2001 American Music Awards denim-on-denim outfits, while out for Halloween on Monday.
